amendment.description: To authorize the demolition of facilities and improvements on certain military installations approved for closure under the defense base closure and realignment process.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 3336 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 3336 proposed by Senator Levin. (consideration: CR S7152-7160) To authorize the demolition of facilities and improvements on certain military installations approved for closure under the defense base closure and realignment process.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3336 proposed by Senator Levin.
